DevUtils

HTML Entity Encoder

Encode special characters to HTML entities.

How to Use
  1. 1Paste text with special characters
  2. 2Click 'Encode' for HTML entities
  3. 3Click 'Decode' to reverse
  4. 4Copy for use in HTML
Pro Tips
  • •Essential for displaying code in HTML
  • •< becomes &lt
  • • and > becomes &gt
  • •
  • •Prevents XSS when displaying user content
  • •Quotes become &quot
  • • and &apos
  • •

All processing happens in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.
